授業方法:
This class will be conducted in English only, and students are expected to use English exclusively while participating. This course is held as a workshop with discussions, self-directed research and presentations, with communication and materials primarily in English. Currently, the intention is for this class to be taught face-to-face; adaptations may be made in light of changing conditions and university policies. 

Students will NEED access to a computer at home (not just a smartphone) or use a school computer lab to complete and submit assignments properly. Desktop, laptop, notebook, Macbook, etc, are fine. Students should also have a Google account and sign up for Google Drive and Google Classroom (both are free).
